extension.description: RandomTV plays random TV episodes from your library. There are a few options: - Include unwatched episodes (only watched will be included by default) - Update Play Count - Repeat Playlist - Shuffle On Repeat - Show Notifications - Enable Auto Stop - Include All TV Shows or Select TV Shows It will also add a context menu item so that you can play a specific show or season with RandomTV
extension.disclaimer: My First Add-On. Please by gentle
